title: 1990 tupac, rap
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054951im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tumblr_m25j8yk0yC1qfwa93o1_500_4580.jpg)

cant find more or better image with this font. Really wanna know that font, help me if you can

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054951im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled_4952.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054951im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tumblr_m25j8yk0yC1qfwa93o1_500_4580.jpg)
author: makemakemake

comments.content:
Looks like hand lettering based on a blend of Futura Condensed Extra Bold and Futura Extra Bold

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054951im_/http:/typophile.com/files/FuturaExtraBoldAsFEAR1_5796.gif)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054951im_/http:/typophile.com/files/FuturaExtraBoldAsBLACK_4612.gif)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054951im_/http:/typophile.com/files/FuturaExtraBoldAsPLANET_5243.gif)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054951im_/http:/typophile.com/files/FuturaCondExtraBoldasFEAR1_5296.gif)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054951im_/http:/typophile.com/files/FuturaCondExtraBoldAsBLACK_4189.gif)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054951im_/http:/typophile.com/files/FuturaCondExtraBoldAsPLANET_3778.gif)
  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/futura/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054951/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/futura/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/futura/")  
Don

Some skill in illustrator could produce a similar effect by distorting Futura Extra Bold to produce the perspective effect  
Don

I think the request is about the "2pacalypse" bit.  
Somewhat, it reminds me of Hobo: [http://www.myfonts.com/search/hobo/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054951/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/hobo/ "http://www.myfonts.com/search/hobo/")

Answering on '2PACALYPSE' piece (thought like Don it could have been 'FEAR OF A BLACK PLANET' which probably set with [Antique Olive](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054951/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/antique+olive) BTW). For the rest, at this size, the 2 /A look different to me so I'd say "not-a-font/hand-done". Even if that sounds cliché, I'd probably have a look to some fonts tagged at MyFonts ' [graffiti](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054951/http:/www.myfonts.com/tags/graffiti)', ' [tag](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054951/http:/www.myfonts.com/tags/tag)' or ' [hip hop](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054951/http:/www.myfonts.com/tags/hip+hop)'. DaFont [Graffiti section](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054951/http:/www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=606) is also worth a look. This lettering has also a ' [comic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054951/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/comic)' feeling so maybe having a look to [Blambot](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054951/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/Blambot), [Comicraft](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054951/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/Comicraft), [Canada Type](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054951/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/Canada_Type) and (My)Fonts tagged ' [comic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054951/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/tag%3Acomic)' would be useful too. Finally, I would also browse [Typodermic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054951/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/Typodermic) and [Pizzadude](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054951/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/PizzaDude.dk) collections.  
Following these tracks and without too much effort, I've found [Show No Shame](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054951/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/pizzadude/show-no-shame), a Pizzadude font which looks not so far with its arced /A "à-la- [Hobo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054951/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/hobo)".

Missed the reverse contrast, but Ryuk did not. so Antique Olive is clsoer than Futura.  
As for 2pacalypse you might find a substitute you like at Creative Market where the emphasis is on hand drawn fonts. This is a link to the Handmade fonts [https://creativemarket.com/search?q=handmade&sort=relevance&category=3](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054951/https:/creativemarket.com/search?q=handmade&sort=relevance&category=3 "https://creativemarket.com/search?q=handmade&sort=relevance&category=3")  
a link to Display fonts [https://creativemarket.com/fonts/display](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054951/https:/creativemarket.com/fonts/display "https://creativemarket.com/fonts/display") and a link to Sans Serif fonts [https://creativemarket.com/fonts/sans-serif/popular](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054951/https:/creativemarket.com/fonts/sans-serif/popular "https://creativemarket.com/fonts/sans-serif/popular")  
For example: Alboroto

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054951im_/http:/typophile.com/files/AlborotoAs2paca_6690.jpg)
  [https://creativemarket.com/RodrigoTypo/18026-Alboroto-Family](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054951/https:/creativemarket.com/RodrigoTypo/18026-Alboroto-Family "https://creativemarket.com/RodrigoTypo/18026-Alboroto-Family")  
Don
